summary: ACME AI provides intelligent customer service automation that reduces response time by 80%, increases satisfaction to 92%, and cuts operational costs by 60%. The company targets the $15.2B global customer service software market with AI-powered solutions for enterprise customers.

funding_ask.use_of_funds: Product development (60%), Sales & Marketing (30%), Team expansion (10%)

founders.name: Sarah Chen
founders.background: Former VP Engineering at Zendesk, MIT Computer Science, 15 years experience

founders.name: Mike Rodriguez
founders.background: Ex-Google AI Research, Stanford PhD, 12 patents in NLP

market_size: TAM: $15.2B (Global customer service software market), SAM: $4.8B (AI-powered customer service), SOM: $240M (Target enterprise segment)
business_model: SaaS subscription model with enterprise licensing
